page.title: 19COMMUNICATION
page.content: The main{COMMUNICATIONS}in Southill are telephones, they have three or four in the village,there are several letter boxes which the locals and passers _by post their letters and cards.To get cards and stamps the locals have to go to the post office. People like the housewife meet in the local shop to share their talks about what they have done through the week.The men of the village go to the pub called the{White Horse}for a pint of beer and to chat about the jobs they have done. Women of the village also see each other when they take their son or daughter to the local school.Another communication is television,you can find out about things that are happening outside Southill.Radios are also used to listen to the news , weather and also pop music.
